about_the_game:
Car Guys

Experience the Ultimate Competitive Multiplayer Racing Game!

Welcome to Car Guys, an exciting multiplayer racing game where skill and strategy come together in fast-paced, action-packed competitions. Represent your nation and climb the global leaderboard in adrenaline-fueled races that will put your reflexes and driving skills to the test!

Features:

🔥 Real-Time Multiplayer

• Race against players from around the world in thrilling, high-speed competitions.

• Enjoy a seamless and lag-free experience powered by Photon Quantum.

🌍 Compete for Your Nation

• Choose your country and contribute to its position on the global leaderboard.

• Prove which nation dominates the track and rise to the top.

🚗 Action-Packed Racing

• Pick up power-ups like missiles and shields to outmaneuver your rivals.

• Master both offensive and defensive driving strategies to claim victory.

🎨 Vibrant Visuals & Optimized Performance

• Experience colorful graphics and dynamic environments that bring each track to life.

• Smooth gameplay at 60 FPS, optimized for both PC and mobile devices.

🏁 Extensive Customization

• Personalize your vehicles with unique skins, decals, and upgrades.

• Choose from sleek sports cars to rugged off-road machines—the possibilities are endless!

🏆 Competitive Events

• Participate in daily and weekly championships inspired by games like Stumble Guys.

• Test your skills and earn exclusive rewards.

🚀 Progression & Meta-Game

• Unlock new tracks, vehicles, and upgrades as you progress.

• Use in-game currency earned from races to enhance your car’s performance.

Join Early Access!

• Be part of the development and help us improve Car Guys with your feedback.

• Your input is crucial to refining the game and making it the best experience possible.

Coming Soon:

• Steam Early Access: Get a first look at Car Guys before the official release and help us polish the final version!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1 (Rosetta required for Intel builds)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS *: Windows 7 (Service Pack 1, 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Experience the thrill of Car Guys, a high-octane multiplayer racing game! Represent your nation, compete in explosive races, and climb the global leaderboard. Customize your ride, engage in daily and weekly championships, and enjoy seamless online play with Photon Quantum. Join the race today!
